name: sockpile
description:
controls:
mouse (recommended) - for clicking the socks

-

sockpile is a game about "joining together" your estranged pairs of socks.
frantically search for the missing sock and earn the highest score.

made in 48 hours for the gmtk game jam, 2021.
this was my first game jam, and i'm very glad i was able to finish something.

i appreciate any and all feedback  / bug reports in the comments :)

-

made with unity

credits:

jummbox.co - website used for making the music
unity forums - :)

-

thank you for playing
